doc.name: ResizablePolygonAttribute
doc.description: This is an attribute that is rendered as a polygon. The vertices parameter is an array of doubles that specify the vertices of the polygon in the form {x1, y1, x2, y2, ... }. The width and height parameters, somewhat awkwardly, are used to specify the overall width and height. The polygon will be scaled to fit the specified width and height.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: The amount of vertices of the corners. This is a double that defaults to 0.0, which indicates no vertices. The default value specifies a rhombus.
